meanings.definition: The city or town area where people live and work.
meanings.sent1: In the urbias, there are many tall buildings and busy streets.
meanings.sent2: I enjoy exploring different urbias when I travel to new places.
meanings.sent3: The urbias was so crowded that even the pigeons had to wait in line.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was an urbias of thoughts, bustling and vibrant.
meanings.sent5: The urbias hummed with the energy of a thousand lives intertwined.

meanings.definition: The quality or state of being urban.
meanings.sent1: The urbias of the city was evident in its modern architecture and bustling nightlife.
meanings.sent2: She appreciated the urbias of the city for its convenience and cultural diversity.
meanings.sent3: His sense of style had a touch of urbias, blending city chic with casual comfort.
meanings.sent4: The urbias of the city enveloped her like a cloak of excitement and opportunity.
meanings.sent5: The urbias of the city pulsed with the rhythm of urban life, vibrant and ever-changing.

meanings.definition: The collective inhabitants of a city or town.
meanings.sent1: The urbias gathered in the town square to celebrate the harvest festival.
meanings.sent2: She felt a sense of belonging among the urbias of her small town.
meanings.sent3: The urbias of the town had a knack for turning even the simplest event into a grand affair.
meanings.sent4: The urbias of the city was a tapestry of diverse cultures and traditions.
meanings.sent5: Each member of the urbias played a unique role in shaping the community's identity.
